queries.select: select r.idrifornimento, r.km, r.data, r.prezzo, r.costolitro, r.note , e.idevento, e.evento, e.note as desevento , a.idauto, a.marca + ' - ' + a.modello as auto, a.note as noteauto , t.tipoalimentazione, t.note as notetipoalimentazione , u.nome, u.note as noteutente from [rifornimentoauto] r left join eventi e on e.idevento = r.idevento left join [auto] a on a.idauto = r.idauto left join tipialimentazione t on t.idtipoalimentazione = a.idtipoalimentazione left join utenti u on u.idutente = a.idutente where r.idrifornimento = {@qrykey='idrf'}

queries.select: SELECT NULL as idauto, NULL as auto, NULL as noteauto , NULL as idevento, NULL as evento, NULL as desevento , NULL as costolitro, NULL as prezzo , NULL as data, NULL as km, NULL as note from (select 1 as col) tbl

select tbl.* from (select a.idauto, a.marca + ' - ' + a.modello as modello, a.note , (select count(*) from rifornimentoauto b where b.idauto = a.idauto) as conteggio from [auto] a where a.idutente in ({@method='info',string:userVisibility})) tbl order by tbl.conteggio desc
select e.idevento, e.evento, e.note from eventi e where e.idutente in ({@method='info',string:userVisibility})
